summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1213 m), feels like temperature (up 2.8°C), outside temperature (up 2.4°C), and inside temperature (up 2.0°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 269.5m higher than yesterday, 599.5m lower than the past week, 1213.4m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 765m and a peak of 2220m, averaging 1535.1m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, the air will feel quite humid. Drizzle or light rain possible, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
